existing_features.title: Update frontend/LIVE_URLS.md so it can be used as the single source of truth after going live: document the final custom domain URL (https://swiftsportshub.com) and the fallback IC boundary URL, and provide clear instructions to replace placeholders ([FRONTEND_CANISTER_ID], [BACKEND_CANISTER_ID]) and update the status fields after deployment/domain activation.

Ensure all absolute URL generation in the frontend that may reference the public site domain uses the centralized utility in frontend/src/utils/publicSiteBaseUrl.ts (and thus respects VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_BASE_URL=https://swiftsportshub.com) rather than hardcoding swiftsportshub.com or using window.location.origin directly.

new_feature_requests.summary: Connect a custom domain to the deployed app

Fix and complete the mainnet + custom domain deployment documentation in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md by replacing the broken/unfinished code fence with a fully formatted, step-by-step guide that includes: deploying backend+frontend to IC mainnet, where/how to set VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_BASE_URL=https://swiftsportshub.com, and the steps needed to connect the custom domain swiftsportshub.com (DNS + IC domain configuration) so the site is reachable at https://swiftsportshub.com.
